overview: Documentary - They were the first to rise up against their leaders in 2009: the first to document the fall-out of their failed revolution online. Now, Iran has closed itself off to the Western press. For the past two years, Manon Loizeau has been following a group of Iranians inside Iran. Many Iranians lost loved ones or were tortured themselves in the aftermath of the elections. Piecing together interviews, she paints a fascinating portrait of the Green Revolution and its aftermath.
title: Inside A Closed Iran
